name: Don't Die! (itch) (Fryon)
description:
Don't Die!

Dodge flying bots, don't get squashed, don't hit the walls. In short, Just Don't Die!

Don't Die is a small arcade game packed with interesting gameplay, clean graphics, and a lots of fun(meh)!

Don't Die is still in development. If you wish to see this game evolve, you can always visit this page and always see what changes have been made. If you are feeling generous today and want to help a developer,  a 1$ for coffee is enough!

Feel free to leave a suggestion or feedback!
